channel.title: Banner for my server high charity 474
channel.description:
Requesting a banner consisting of this background image, for my server.
[img]http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080530211751/halo/images/f/fa/High_Charitypic.jpg[/img]
I'd like it to be a horizontal rectangle, not too tall, that in terms of size, looks like this just a tad bit shorter in width: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/compressed.gif[/img]
Just the difference is, no players or characters on the front, but just how the gif says words like pet systems, fully working skills, daily updates, etc, id like it to say "Real 474 Server", "Runs on Hyperion", "Challenging bosses", and "Reworked armor and weapon system"
